content:
# The coal was successfully inserted into the stone furnace, which now has 8 coal remaining for fuel.
# 
# The furnace is currently processing 1 iron ore and has produced a total of 13 iron plates so far.
# 
# I should consider gathering more iron ore soon, as the furnace will run out of input shortly. 
# 
# I will wait a moment to see if the furnace completes the smelting of the last iron ore.

sleep(10)  # Wait for 10 seconds to allow the furnace to finish smelting.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
print(f"Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")
